Class Hero

java.lang.Object
Entities.Hero
Direct Known Subclasses:
Archer, Mage, Warrior
public abstract class Hero extends Object
Abstract base class representing a hero character in the game. This class encapsulates common attributes and behaviors that all heroes share, such as health, strength, inventory management, and combat capabilities.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hero

      public Hero(String name, int hp, int strength, int gold, MainWeapon weapon)
      Constructs a new Hero with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The hero's name
      hp - The hero's initial and maximum health points
      strength - The hero's base strength attribute
      gold - The hero's initial gold amount
      weapon - The hero's initial main weapon

    • Hero

      public Hero(Hero other)
      Copy constructor for creating a new Hero instance that is a copy of another Hero.
      Parameters:
      other - The Hero object to copy

    • hasConsumables

      public boolean hasConsumables()
      Checks if the hero has any consumable items in their inventory.
      Returns:
      true if the hero has at least one consumable item, false otherwise

      Returns:

      public ArrayList<Item> getInventory()
      Gets the hero's inventory.
      Returns:

    • getTotalAttackPower

      public int getTotalAttackPower()
      Calculates the hero's total attack power. This includes base strength plus the attack power of the equipped weapon (if any).
      Returns:
      The hero's total attack power

    • equipWeapon

      public void equipWeapon(MainWeapon weapon)
      Equips a weapon and applies any passive effects it may have. Passive effects can enhance the hero's attributes like strength or maximum HP.
      Parameters:
      weapon - The weapon to equip

    • getEquippedWeapon

      public MainWeapon getEquippedWeapon()
      Gets the currently equipped weapon.
      Returns:
      The hero's currently equipped main weapon

    • unequipWeapon

      public void unequipWeapon(MainWeapon weapon)
      Unequips a weapon and removes any passive effects it provided. If removing an effect would reduce maximum HP below current HP, current HP is adjusted accordingly.
      Parameters:
      weapon - The weapon to unequip

    • addItemToInventory

      public void addItemToInventory(Item item)
      Adds an item to the hero's inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add to the inventory

    • getBoughtItems

      public List<Item> getBoughtItems()
      Gets the list of items the hero has purchased.
      Returns:
      The list of purchased items

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Applies damage to the hero, reducing their current HP. Health points cannot go below zero.
      Parameters:
      damage - The amount of damage to apply

      public abstract Hero copy()
